books.Title: 1Q84
books.Author: Haruki Murakami
books.Summary: It is about a women called Aomame that start to see weird things in her world and enter a parallel existence.

books.Title: My Brilliant Friend
books.Author: Elena Ferrante
books.Summary: In four books, tells the story of two close friends throughout their lives in Naples. It is very deep and real.

books.Title: Freedom and Midnight
books.Author: Dominique Lapierre and Larry Collins
books.Summary: Tells the tragic story of India Independence and partition and includes real conversations with many of the protagonists.

books.Title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
books.Author: Stieg Larsson
books.Summary: This saga is about a journalist called Mikael Blomkvist that is hired by Henrik Vanger to uncovered Harriett Vanger's disappearence. The story developed from there to a breathtaking thriller.
